attributes.action: Stop wasting NHS funds on non-essential surgeries and treatments
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS was set up to protect the health of the Brisitsh public, but not spends an obscene amount of money on non-essential procedures, whilst people with genuine health problems suffer.
The NHS should be returned to a 'safety net' for the uk, concentrating on essential health issues, and all funding should be stopped for "life style choice" operations, such as Sex Change Operations,
Plastic Surgery, and IVF fertility treatment.
